title: Instruktionen
instructions: Anleitung zum Ultimatum Spiel. Bitte sorgf√§ltig lesen.
thisGame: This game is played in rounds by two human players randomly paired.
inEachRround: In each round, one of the them, called BIDDER, makes an offer to the other player, called RESPONDENT, about how to share 100 ECU (Experimental Currency). 100 ECU are equal to 0.05 USD.
theRespondant: The RESPONDENT can either accept or reject the offer of the BIDDER. If he / she accepts, both players split 100 ECU accordingly, else both get 0.
theGame: The game is repeated 20 rounds, therefore the maximum bonus available is 1 dollar.
ifYouUnderstood: If you understood the instructions correctly press the button to proceed to the game.
